alert.note: Alert for Garfield; McCone (Montana) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Winter Weather Advisory issued December 26 at 8:03AM MST until December 26 at 11:00PM MST by NWS Glasgow
info.description: ...WINTER WEATHER ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 11 AM THIS MORNING TO 11 PM MST THIS EVENING... ...WIND CHILL ADVISORY WILL EXPIRE AT 8 AM MST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Snow expected. Total snow accumulations of up to two inches. Winds gusting as high as 35 mph. * WHERE...McCone and Garfield Counties. * WHEN...From 11 AM this morning to 11 PM MST this evening. * IMPACTS...Plan on slippery road conditions. Patchy blowing snow could significantly reduce visibility. The dangerously cold wind chills as low as 35 below zero could cause frostbite on exposed skin in as little as 10 minutes.
info.instruction: Slow down and use caution while traveling. The latest road conditions for the state you are calling from can be obtained by calling 5 1 1.
